<title level="1" right="Rules">[Special Modifiers](/Rules.aspx?ID=2886)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 116 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
You can also add special, thematic modifiers for certain skill uses. For instance, you might give a creature that secretes adhesive “[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +7 (+9 to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=2374) or [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45)).” This special bonus should still remain at or below the extreme number, especially if it has a combat purpose like the Grab bonus above.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
